meanings.definition: To carve, mold, or stamp a design on a surface
meanings.sent1: She enjoys embossing her initials on leather wallets.
meanings.sent2: The artist is embossing a beautiful floral pattern on the metal sheet.
meanings.sent3: The kids had fun embossing their names on the soft clay.
meanings.sent4: His words embossed a lasting impression on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The sun embossing the sky with vibrant colors at sunset was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The process of creating raised patterns on a surface
meanings.sent1: The embossing of the logo on the paper added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The embossing machine efficiently creates intricate designs on the cards.
meanings.sent3: The embossing on the cake made it look too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The embossing on the book cover gave it a luxurious feel.
meanings.sent5: The embossing on the invitation card made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The act of decorating with raised designs
meanings.sent1: Her embossing of the picture frame made it a unique gift.
meanings.sent2: The embossing on the vase added a special touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The embossing on the dress made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The embossing on the wall brought life to the plain room.
meanings.sent5: The embossing on the gift box made it feel more special.

meanings.definition: A raised design or pattern on a surface
meanings.sent1: The embossing on the leather bag gave it a sophisticated look.
meanings.sent2: The embossing on the notebook cover was beautifully done.
meanings.sent3: The embossing on the phone case made it easier to grip.
meanings.sent4: The embossing on the fabric added texture to the dress.
meanings.sent5: The embossing on the medal made it a prized possession.
